channel.title: 法新社
channel.description: 这是一个追踪法新社news的种子

item.title: 三名美国宇航员和一名俄罗斯宇航员于周日晚从佛罗里达起飞，前往国际空间站执行为期六个月的任务。
item.description:
New crew heads to ISS.

Three American astronauts and a Russian cosmonaut blasted off Sunday night from Florida for a six-month mission on the International Space Stationhttps://t.co/paJ5tkD6XR pic.twitter.com/Bm22Zu7krX

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 4, 2024

item.title: 视频：人工智能帮助寻找被非法收养的儿童： 人工智能将帮助寻找被非法收养的儿童。一个致力于寻找智利 1973-1990 年独裁统治期间被非法收养和带到国外的儿童的非政府组织将利用人工智能寻找这些儿童。
item.description:
VIDEO: AI to help in search for children illegally adopted.

An NGO dedicated to finding children illegally adopted and taken abroad during Chile's 1973-1990 dictatorship will search for them using artificial intelligence.

Hijos y Madres del Silencio ('Children and Mothers of… pic.twitter.com/vdrdEkjqCX

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 4, 2024

item.title: @AFP 的 Thibaud Moritz 拍摄了在法国西南部波尔多举行的 Carnaval Des Deux Rives 期间身着传统非洲主题服装游行的参与者。
item.description:
Parade of colour.@AFP’s Thibaud Moritz photographs participants in traditional African-themed clothing parading through Bordeaux, southwestern France, during the Carnaval Des Deux Rives pic.twitter.com/dszh1cCkO2

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 4, 2024

item.title: 法国立法者预计将于周一将堕胎权写入国家宪法，这在全球尚属首次，获得了绝大多数公众的支持
item.description:
French lawmakers are expected Monday to anchor the right to abortion in the country's constitution, in a global first that has garnered overwhelming public supporthttps://t.co/69rftUVNEe pic.twitter.com/swDC3upikE

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 4, 2024

item.title: "停止骚扰我们 "菲律宾外长恩里克-马纳洛（Enrique Manalo）告诉 @法新社 ，菲律宾希望和平解决与中国的海洋争端，但他向中国政府传达了一个简单的信息："停止骚扰我们
item.description:
"Stop harassing us"

Philippine foreign minister Enrique Manalo tells @AFP that his country wants to solve maritime disputes with China peacefully -- but delivered a simple message to Beijing: "stop harassing us"https://t.co/d8LdF6rq72 pic.twitter.com/Wp1SORuBs1

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 4, 2024

item.title: 上周末，数百名阿列克谢-纳瓦尔尼的支持者排队向这位已故的俄罗斯反对党领袖献花和致敬，这是对这位上个月在北极监狱囚禁区去世的反腐运动人士的重要支持。
item.description:
Hundreds of Alexei Navalny supporters queued to lay flowers and pay tribute to the deceased Russian opposition leader over the weekend, in a significant show of support for the anti-corruption campaigner, who died last month in an Arctic prison colony https://t.co/jQE25yrhc2 pic.twitter.com/nzFd39L5em

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 4, 2024

item.title: 据 @AFP 记者和一个非政府组织报道，黑帮成员袭击了海地首都的主要监狱，引发数千名囚犯越狱，造成至少十几人死亡。
item.description:
At least a dozen people died when gang members attacked the main prison in Haiti's capital, triggering a breakout by several thousand inmates, an @AFP journalist and an NGO reporthttps://t.co/wxJ68JaEZD pic.twitter.com/Z6EAKo2eof

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 4, 2024

item.title: 厄瓜多尔著名的加拉帕戈斯群岛（Galapagos archipelago）上一座无人居住岛屿上的火山正在喷发熔岩，当局称，这可能会威胁到一系列独特的动物物种。
item.description:
A volcano on an uninhabited island of Ecuador's famous Galapagos archipelago is spewing lava, authorities say, potentially threatening an array of unique animal specieshttps://t.co/Qrv6OwHoP8 pic.twitter.com/zUuBEqBdj5

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 4, 2024

item.title: 随着阿富汗数十年战争的结束，汽车驾驶员们利用新发现的安全优势，让他们的改装汽车在比赛中相互较量，或展示漂移技巧
item.description:
With the end of decades of war in Afghanistan, motorists are taking advantage of newfound security to pit their souped-up cars against each other in races, or show off drifting skills pic.twitter.com/os9AkZJHS0

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 4, 2024

item.title: 塞浦路斯北部自行宣布分离的国家领导人告诉法新社，除非土族塞人的主权和平等地位得到承认，否则他们不会坐在任何谈判桌前。
item.description:
Turkish Cypriots will not sit at any negotiating table unless their sovereignty and equal status is recognized, the leader of the breakaway, self-declared state in northern Cyprus told AFP https://t.co/z8tqzIlqi7 pic.twitter.com/IUBgtR4dIW

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 4, 2024

item.title: #日本基准日经指数首次突破 40,000 点
item.description:
#BREAKING Japan's benchmark Nikkei index surpasses 40,000 for the first time pic.twitter.com/F5ZhUFLlAS

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 4, 2024

item.title: 高尔夫传奇人物泰格-伍兹将在周一于佛罗里达州朱诺海滩举行的塞米诺尔职业会员锦标赛上开球，这位 15 次大满贯赛冠军将在 2021 年的车祸之后，尝试看看自己是否还能在美巡赛上争夺冠军 #AFPSports
item.description:
Golf legend Tiger Woods will tee it up in Monday's Seminole pro-member tournament in Juno Beach, Florida, as the 15-time major champion tries to find out if he can contend again on the PGA Tour after his 2021 car crash #AFPSports https://t.co/q7GaMpWqgu pic.twitter.com/VY5QtwpkUw

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 3, 2024

item.title: 乌克兰总统沃洛德梅尔-泽连斯基（Volodymyr Zelensky）周日呼吁全世界帮助基辅战胜 "俄罗斯邪恶"，因为敖德萨无人机袭击造成的死亡人数上升到 12 人，其中包括五名儿童。
item.description:
Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky on Sunday called for the world to help Kyiv defeat "Russian evil" as the death toll from a drone strike on Odesa rose to 12, including five children https://t.co/b4QmSmJNGF pic.twitter.com/QelJ2E85lw

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 3, 2024

item.title: 一名军方人士及其家人说，马里一名上校在巴马科被捕，他最近出版的书中引用了国际人权组织关于军队虐待平民的报告。
item.description:
A colonel in Mali whose recent book cites international rights organizations' reports on army abuses of civilians has been arrested in Bamako, a military source and his family said https://t.co/19Ov74bNqt pic.twitter.com/49c4TJxbdt

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 3, 2024

item.title: 英迪拉-特尔古巴耶娃在前夫企图杀害她的事件中幸存下来，她正在为在祖国哈萨克斯坦被承认为受害者而奋斗。
item.description:
After surviving her ex-husband's attempt to kill her, Indira Tergeubayeva is fighting to be recognized as a victim in her native Kazakhstan.

Her experience is not unique in the country, where domestic violence is not included in the criminal code https://t.co/sGLero9dcW pic.twitter.com/Y7InTSJS1I

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 3, 2024

item.title: 在一棵神树的树荫下，土著智者一边咀嚼古柯叶，一边眺望哥伦比亚内华达山脉正在融化、白雪皑皑的山峰。
item.description:
In the shade of a sacred tree, Indigenous wise men chew coca leaves as they consider the melting, snow-capped peaks of Colombia's Sierra Nevada mountains.

As a "consequence of man's actions, it is slowly warming, more every year," one says https://t.co/kn19lBAQRd pic.twitter.com/gdZlK6SiZE

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 3, 2024

item.title: 上周末，数百名阿列克谢-纳瓦尔尼的支持者排队向这位已故的俄罗斯反对党领袖献花和致敬，这是对这位上个月在北极监狱囚禁区去世的反腐运动人士的重要支持。
item.description:
Hundreds of Alexei Navalny supporters queued to lay flowers and pay tribute to the deceased Russian opposition leader over the weekend, in a significant show of support for the anti-corruption campaigner, who died last month in an Arctic prison colony https://t.co/jQE25yrhc2 pic.twitter.com/rUbOOLipzB

item.title: 沙特阿拉伯、俄罗斯和其他几个欧佩克+成员国周日宣布延长石油减产，作为经济不确定性后提振油价战略的一部分
item.description:
Saudi Arabia, Russia and several other OPEC+ members on Sunday announced extensions to oil production cuts as part of a strategy to boost prices following economic uncertainty https://t.co/1KlUBplzSw

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 3, 2024

item.title: 周日，奥拉夫-库艾（Olav Kooij）在巴黎-尼斯（Paris-Nice）赛段的首站比赛中以毫厘之差险胜马德斯-佩德森（Mads Pedersen），158 公里的山路赛程最终以集体冲刺决出胜负 #AFPSports
item.description:
Olav Kooij won the opening stage of Paris-Nice by a hair's breadth from Mads Pedersen on Sunday when the 158km hilly run came down to a mass sprint #AFPSports https://t.co/kHmic2RV4b pic.twitter.com/T3QNnUrJDd

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 3, 2024

item.title: 一周前，布基纳法索北部的三个村庄遭到袭击，约 170 人被 "处决"。
item.description:
Around 170 people were "executed" in attacks on three villages in northern Burkina Faso a week ago, a regional prosecutor said on Sunday as jihadist violence flares in the junta-ruled country https://t.co/TnubQrOfpK pic.twitter.com/PDSfXMke9p

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 3, 2024

item.title: 周日，当人们在加沙一处遭到空袭的房屋下寻找幸存者时，拉尼娅-阿布-安扎（Rania Abu Anza）低头凝视着两个未能幸存的孩子：她的一对双胞胎婴儿
item.description:
As men searched for survivors beneath a Gaza home pummeled by an air strike, Rania Abu Anza gazed down on Sunday at two children who did not survive: her infant twins https://t.co/7CE7Qdknze

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 3, 2024

item.title: 2024 年 2 月 2 日，一名伊拉克露营者在萨马瓦沙漠的帐篷里观看日落。在远离大城市喧嚣的地方，越来越多的伊拉克年轻人利用重新获得的安全感，探索该国宁静的沙漠度假胜地。@AFP @AFPphoto
item.description:
An Iraqi camper watches the sunset from his geep in the Samawa desert on February 2, 2024. Far from the hustle and bustle of major cities, young Iraqis are increasingly taking advantage of a renewed sense of safety to explore the country's serene desert getaways. @AFP @AFPphoto pic.twitter.com/bXoHQVkRXC

— Hussein Faleh | حسين فالح (@Hussein_Afp) March 3, 2024

item.title: 瑞士选民周日以压倒性多数支持增加养老金支付的提案，此举被支持者誉为 "历史性的"，因为瑞士老龄化人口正面临着生活费用激增的问题。
item.description:
Swiss voters on Sunday overwhelmingly backed a proposal to increase pension payments, a move hailed as "historic" by backers at a time when the country's ageing population faces surging living expenses https://t.co/p5h3TSwcaB

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 3, 2024

item.title: 根据地区和国际环保组织联盟的一份新报告，湄公河中五分之一的鱼类物种面临灭绝的威胁
item.description:
One-fifth of fish species in the Mekong river face the threat of extinction, according to a new report from a coalition of regional and international environmental groups https://t.co/QCVDhq8vVC pic.twitter.com/Yog52uUL5Z

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 3, 2024

item.title: 法国极右翼在欧洲竞选活动中瞄准移民问题 via @RFI_En
item.description:
French far right targets immigration in European campaign launch https://t.co/4I2RYiAQlC@afp via @RFI_En

— Tom Barfield (@tombarfield) March 3, 2024

item.title: 德国周日指责俄罗斯总统弗拉基米尔-普京（Vladimir Putin）试图通过窃听泄露德国军队关于乌克兰战争的机密讨论来挑拨离间，而此时柏林正面临着向基辅提供金牛座导弹的压力 ➡️。
item.description:
Germany on Sunday accused Russian President Vladimir Putin of trying to sow disunity with the wiretap leak of a confidential German army discussion on the Ukraine war, at a time when Berlin is under pressure to supply the Taurus missile to Kyiv ➡️ https://t.co/xNQ9TP35Cd pic.twitter.com/8qFgDtxa9T

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 3, 2024

item.title: 视频：🏴󠁧󠁢󠁳󠁣󠁴󠁿 "太震撼了！"：在苏格兰西海岸偏远的坎贝尔敦，素食巧克力师菲奥娜-麦克阿瑟为今年的奥斯卡颁奖礼制作了礼品袋。
item.description:
VIDEO: 🏴󠁧󠁢󠁳󠁣󠁴󠁿 'It's mind-blowing!': Scottish chocolatier makes film-inspired treats for Oscar nominees

In remote Campbeltown on the west coast of Scotland, vegan chocolatier Fiona McArthur has created the confectionery for the goodie bags at this year's Oscars.

📹 @jessicahojo pic.twitter.com/zPgVkI6wtr

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 3, 2024

item.title: 人造冰川缓解吉尔吉斯斯坦的干旱➡️ ✍️@BrunoKalouaz📷 Vyacheslav Oseledkofor @AFP
item.description:
Artificial glaciers stave off drought in Kyrgyzstan

➡️ https://t.co/pxgxo0vHwR

item.title: 俄罗斯政府周日表示，作为提振石油价格举措的一部分，俄罗斯将在 2024 年第二季度将石油日产量削减近 50 万桶 ➡️
item.description:
Russia will cut oil production by almost half a million barrels per day in the second quarter of 2024, the government said on Sunday, as part of a move to boost prices ➡️ https://t.co/WnqfjRec0q pic.twitter.com/h5YH3heMYX

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 3, 2024
